markdown:
<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Ravounel Gazetteer](/Articles.aspx?ID=3)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 58</row>

Nestled between the shadows of Nidal and the diabolic plots of Cheliax, the new nation of Ravounel is a bastion of freedom and hope.
name: Ravounel Gazetteer
